content: अवशेषः Remnant, rest, leavings, remainder; रक्षसामवशेषेण, अह्नः, पुण्यानां <ls>Rām.</ls>; वृत्तांत° <ls>M. 5</ls> the rest of the story; in this sense usually in <ab>comp.</ab>; अर्ध° having only one half left; कथा° or नाम° one who survives only in narration or name, having only the tale or name left behind; used figuratively for dead; see the words <ab>s. v.</ab>; भस्म° remaining only in ashes, reduced to ashes; <ls>Ś. 3. 3</ls>; भस्मावशेषं मदनं चकार reduced to ashes <ls>Ku. 3. 72</ls>, <ls>Śi. 10. 16</ls>; सावशेषमिव भट्टिन्या वचनं <ls>M. 4</ls> unfinished; सावशेषो विषवेगः {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%} still remaining; शीर्षावशेषीकृतः <ls>Bh. 2. 34</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 2. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 69</ls>; शृणु मे सावशेषं वचः <ls>Ś. 2</ls> hear me out, let me finish my speech; अल्पावशेषायुः <ls>K. 46</ls> having a short span of life; see निरवशेष also.
